refnamediv.refpurpose: Use the language of target when generating cross-reference text?

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: If non-zero, the language of the target will be used when generating cross reference text. Usually, the current language is used when generating text (that is, the language of the element that contains the cross-reference element). But setting this parameter allows the language of the element pointed to to control the generated text.
